column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Huge collection of artwork! I am absolutely in love with this beautiful museum! I really do regret not being able to see all of the galleries in the amount of short time I had when I first visited this museum on Friday. I got in for $12 with my student ID (for you students out there who wants to get in for cheaper prices)
column2: and it was definitely worth it. Great Impressionist art collections along with some modern art (they have a wing dedicated only to that while the rest are for the traditional art works). There is also some Frank Lloyd Wright works to look at
column3: if you are into architectural sketches. After all
column4: his works of the houses are located in Illinois!
